select * from (select a.*, DISTNACE_WGS84(${xl}, ${yl}, S_Y, S_X) as distance from (select * from store)a) where 1=1
and s_no in(select s_no from store_category where ct_no = (select ct_no from category where ct_name=#{category}))
and s_name LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%'
and distance<5
order by S_REVIEWCOUNT DESC
order by trunc((s_taste+s_amount+s_delivery)/3/s_reviewcount,2) desc
